name: Seeds grow
description:
"Seeds grow" - This game is about a man, who decided to build his farm. In this game, you will need to reap and harvest, fulfill orders and receive money.

W, A, S, D - Move;

Left Mouse Button - Action;

Backpack - Exit;

P.S.: That game was my first project and I understand my game is not beautiful, but this is just a prototype I want to upgrade my game and I think You help me. Thank you!
